SMW Subobject for NormalHigh Alchemy value: 5910Examine: A melee helm from the order of the Void Knights.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Void melee helmUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Void melee helm.pngWeight: 0.453Value: 9851Version anchor: NormalRelease date: 17 July 2007Item ID: 11665

A void melee helm is a piece of Void Knight equipment that is obtained as a reward in the Pest Control minigame. It can be bought from a Void Knight for 200 commendation points, although a player must have at least level 42 Attack, Strength, Defence, Hitpoints, Ranged, and Magic, along with level 22 Prayer to buy and wear one.

The melee helm grants the player a 10% bonus towards melee damage and accuracy when worn with the void knight top, robe and gloves. The void knight mace and void seal are not required for the bonus. It has the same stats as the other two helmets. It is of great benefit to training melee skills but maximum strength gear gives more experience over time.

If the player dies below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 40,000 coins by using the item on Perdu.

[[File:Void melee helm chathead.png|left]]
A '''void melee helm''' is a piece of [[Void Knight equipment]] that is obtained as a reward in the [[Pest Control]] minigame. It can be bought from a [[Void Knight]] for 200 [[commendation points]], although a player must have at least level 42 [[Attack]], [[Strength]], [[Defence]], [[Hitpoints]], [[Ranged]], and [[Magic]], along with level 22 [[Prayer]] to buy and wear one.

The melee helm grants the player a 10% bonus towards [[melee]] damage and accuracy when worn with the [[void knight top]], [[Void knight robe|robe]] and [[Void knight gloves|gloves]]. The [[void knight mace]] and [[void seal]] are '''not''' required for the bonus. It has the same stats as the other two helmets. It is of great benefit to training melee skills but maximum strength gear gives more experience over time.

If the player dies below level 20 [[Wilderness]], it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 40,000 coins by using the item on [[Perdu]].
